# Joe 

## Features
* Hide Dock Background
* Hide Folder Background
* Hide Folder Icon Background
* Hide Page Dots
* Hide Icon Labels
* Hide Testflight Dot
* Hide Notification Badges
* Hide App Library Blur
* Hide Status Bar
* Hide Folder Title
* Disable Icon Fly In
* Hide Quick Actions
* Hide Lock Icon
* Hide Date
* Hide No Older Notifications
* Use Compact Date Format
* Set Number of Icons On Your Dock
